name: 雪他 (Yukita) - vexCode
tagline: The VEX code, build guide, and everything else VEX for 雪他 (Yukita)
body:
### Welcome to 雪他 (Yukita) prototype
All of our codding from VEX prototype one to our final VEX model can be found here.

### Hardware
Specific hardware requirements (other than VEX parts) for each individual model can be found in the release notes.

- Caster Wheel
- VEX Net USB
- VEX ARM Cortex
- Arduino UNO

### Software
We used a few different software platforms and an Arduino for this project:

- RobotC
- Arduino IDE

### Authors and Contributors
Huge shout out to @exedude & Tim Felker for helping with the building process! If you would like to become involved then branch off and notify us of any improvements. Want to be on-board with the official coding? Let us know!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with our code or have questions? Feel free to contact us at 234111@shakopeeschools.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
